You now understand why this app is dangerous and why Donald Trump needs to be stopped...We make America great again by voting Trump out!! Trump 2020ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸On a grave stoneğŸ˜»ğŸ’–ğŸ˜˜

attributes.title: Trumps an ass

I first downloaded this app or tried to download this app 10 days after I was born on 420 BC and to my surprise it didnâ€™t download into -69 days ago. SHREK-my second problem my head was when I first open the app I started hearing noises of trump talking in my ear whispering baby boo-boo baby boo-boo. Enter sign up it asked for my number so I gave it my number so I could sign up and not 69 seconds later I started getting spam messages from Trump himself. And they wereâœ¨creepyâœ¨ so then I tried deleting the app but none of it stopped the whispering continued and the texts continued and not only after I deleted the app did everything continue but I got 420 viruses on my phone from Trump himself saying that I automatically have to poop my pants in his mouth or else I will be executed. But anyway Bob Ross is pretty cool right;)ğŸ‘ğŸ‘…ğŸ‘
